Header: A Police mission to minimize road accidents
Content: Police Media Spokesman SP, Ruwan Gunasekera says a special operation is afoot to avert possible road accidents during the festive season. Ruwan Gunasekera was speaking at a media briefing held in Colombo. He pointed out that 470 drunken drivers were arrested countrywide during the period of 24 hours which ended at 6.00 a.m. today. He also stated that the operation has been implemented since the 15th of December to minimize damages caused by road accidents. Ruwan Gunasekera highlighted that a considerable amount of road accidents are caused by drunken drivers every year.
